metadata.title: The lack of a tissue 8 Contents

abstract.original_text: Gastroenteritis (GE) and its associated diarrheal diseases remain as one of the top causes of death in the world. Noroviruses (NoVs) are a group of genetically diverse RNA viruses that cause the great majority of nonbacterial gastroenteritis in humans. However, there is still no vaccine licensed for human use to prevent NoV GE.

sentences.segment_text: Gastroenteritis ( GE ) and its associated diarrheal diseases remain as one of the top causes of death in the world .
Noroviruses ( NoVs ) are a group of genetically diverse RNA viruses that cause the great majority of nonbacterial gastroenteritis in humans .
However , there is still no vaccine licensed for human use to prevent NoV GE .
